item.title: Using LiquidTap Python Client â‘
item.description: # table of contents Introduction Get “Order Book” of “Liquid by Quoine” #Introduction The API of “Liquid by Quoine” is open to the public, so I will try various hits. First, from the WebSocket service. #Get “Order Book” of “Liquid by Quoine” Let’s install the library and get BTC/JPY. (2020.01.22) Install library $ pip3 install liquidtap Writing code based on the sample of the head family Home: https://github.
